Articles.Content:
Hey, I'd like to suggest that this tech be renamed to Unkerbaled Tech, since it would be a lot more fitting and also is gender neutral (since there are now female Kerbals too)!

Just my two cents, maybe others might agree?

Hi Erik J1, and welcome to the forums!

This was actually [suggested somewhat recently](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112691-Use-more-Gender-neutral-Language), and the thread went to some rather unpleasant places. Unfortunately, much as I'd like to see a reasonable discussion about the suggestion there is a lot of evidence suggesting that some parts of this community have trouble staying reasonable about this particular topic. I hope I do not discourage you too much by locking this before it heads down that path.
